FreelanceSelf employed France July 2019 to July 2019 Remote Developed a custom WordPress for a french personal financing blog Did a complete responsive redesign of the blog using latest techs and result of a few kb of CSS and JS I chose not to include any UI framework to preserve performance as the blogs business model is based on advertisement Ad scripts and WordPress external plugins already
